snippet: Charlotte Bobcats guard Gerald Henderson is expected to be sidelined for two to four weeks because of a sprained left foot, the team said.
abstract: Charlotte Bobcats guard Gerald Henderson is sidelined because of sprained foot; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Charlotte Bobcats guard Gerald Henderson is expected to be sidelined for two to four weeks because of a sprained left foot, the team said.

headline.seo: Bobcats Guard Gerald Henderson Out for 2-4 Weeks
headline.main: Bobcats Guard Henderson Out for 2-4 Weeks
